sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the operation of Ribbon Blender for dry mixing of powders and granules.
sections.scope: Applicable to blending activities carried out in the Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Verify that the blender trough and ribbon blades are clean.
Check safety guards and ensure the lid is properly seated.
Load ingredients into the trough (up to 40-70% of total volume).
Close the lid and start the motor.
Allow blending for the validated time duration.
Monitor for uniform mixing and absence of dead spots.
Position for discharge and open the bottom valve.
Collect the blended powder in appropriate containers.
Clean the trough and blades thoroughly after each batch.
Document mixing time and observations in the production record.
precautions: Do not exceed recommended fill levels for effective blending.
Ensure the blender is stopped before opening the charging lid.
Clean thoroughly to prevent cross-contamination between batches.
Check ribbon blades for any signs of wear or damage.
Wear appropriate dust masks and PPE during loading/unloading.
